message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product. I think it would really benefit you. I'm asking for $160 to start. What do you think?
Hi Alice,  $160 is a bit too high for me. I'm really interested in this product but I'm only able to go up to $80 right now.  What do you think?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $80 is quite low for the value this product offers. How about we meet in the middle at $120? That's my final offer.
